Class.Name: ReceiveScriptEvent
Class.Description: Allows you to handle a event.

In.Name: Connect
In.Description: Connect this event handler to the specified entity.

Out.Name: OnConnected
Out.Description: Signaled when a connection has taken place.

Out.Name: OnDisconnected
Out.Description: Signaled when this event handler is disconnected.

Out.Name: OnFailure
Out.Description: Signaled when it is not possible to connect this handler.
